exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable P.

In environment H : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Prop) (P0 : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Prop), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P0 (arity L (inr f0)) t -> P (apply L f0 t)) -> P0 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L), P t -> forall t0 : fol.Terms L n, P0 n t0 -> P0 (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t t : Term Unable to unify "t" with "LNN2LNT_term (LNT2LNN_term t)".
Cannot find a relation to rewrite.
The reference map_injective was not found in the current environment.
The reference IHt was not found in the current environment.

original: intros t. induction t using Term_Terms_ind. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite H. f_equal. apply map_injective. apply IHt.
